metadata.synopsis: Tom Lawrence (Tom Conway), the ace detective known as "the Falcon," hopes to enjoy a relaxing vacation in Los Angeles, but soon a dead body turns up on a film set. Aided by stunt driver Billie (Veda Ann Borg) and Inspector McBride (Emory Parnell), Tom seeks to determine the murderer in the case, which comes to involve gambling, jewelry and motion pictures. The suspects include an actress (Barbara Hale), a director (Konstantin Shayne), a crook (Sheldon Leonard) and a producer (John Abbott).

reviews: A snappy and enjoyable crime drama.
Backstage location filming at RKO Studios will please movie buffs, in this little mystery.
